summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of Payroll Attendance System Reports functionality. Fixed frontend routing issue and verified all key features are working correctly with proper punch display, calculations, and Reports page functionality.

design_issues.issue: Charts and visual elements are well designed and functional

passed_tests: ✅ Backend API: Login with credentials companyCode=apextime, username=admin, password=admin works perfectly
✅ Backend API: Reports endpoints return proper data with correct calculations
✅ Backend API: First In and Last Out times are correctly calculated (earliest and latest punches)
✅ Backend API: Working hours calculated as First In to Last Out (e.g., 10:12 to 17:37 = ~7.4 hrs)
✅ Frontend: Login page loads beautifully with proper styling
✅ Frontend: Navigation to Reports page works after login
✅ Frontend: Reports page loads with proper 'Reports Center' title
✅ Frontend: Daily/Weekly/Monthly tabs are present and clickable
✅ Frontend: Summary cards show Total Records (6), Present (6), Absent (0), Late Arrivals (3), Avg Hours (9.0), Total Hours (54)
✅ Frontend: Data table displays employee attendance with all required columns
✅ Frontend: First In column shows earliest punch times (10:12, 10:16)
✅ Frontend: Last Out column shows latest punch times (17:37, 18:17)
✅ Frontend: Hours column shows calculated working hours (7.4 hrs, 8.0 hrs)
✅ Frontend: Late column shows late arrival times (42m, 46m)
✅ Frontend: Status badges show 'PRESENT' for complete shifts
✅ Frontend: Punches column shows individual punch times
✅ Frontend: Charts render correctly - Attendance Status doughnut and Department Breakdown bar chart
✅ Frontend: Filter dropdowns present for Date, Department, Branch, Location
✅ Frontend: PDF and Excel download buttons are visible and accessible
✅ Frontend: Month/year selectors work on Monthly tab
✅ Frontend: Week start date filter works on Weekly tab
✅ Integration: Frontend successfully fetches and displays real backend data
✅ UI Design: Clean, professional interface with proper DM Sans font family
✅ Responsive: Interface works well at desktop resolution (1920x1080)
